Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Creatine kinase levels were normal prior to daptomycin therapy and were not reassessed .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Creatine kinase |
| Daptomycin |

Note:
The paragraph does not contain any explicit mention of the chemical structure or formula for creatine kinase or daptomycin. However, creatine kinase is an enzyme, and daptomycin is an antibiotic. Both are commonly referred to as chemicals in a biological context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Note:
The paragraph mentions "creatine kinase levels" which can be interpreted as a measurement of the activity of the creatine kinase enzyme. Therefore, it is considered a valid chemical entity in this context. "Therapy" and "were not reassessed" do not refer to chemicals and can be disregarded.
